original: 食彼天像及飲酒所稱名者。

original: 用馬肉作頻那夜迦天像。
analyzed: 用馬肉作頻那夜迦天像。
translated: Use horse meat to make an image of Pinenayakaten.
On the eighth or fourteenth day of the dark half of the month.

original: 持明者著青色衣及青絡腋。

original: 往設咄嚕門前左脇而臥。
analyzed: 往設咄嚕門前左脇而臥。

original: 食前天像及飲酒所稱名者。
analyzed: 食前天像及飲酒所稱名者。

Will quickly die in a short time.

Use the flesh of a caṇḍāla or other low-caste person.
Make an image of Pṛthivī.
One cubit long.
Fill the belly of the image with pungent medicine.

original: 持明者於黑月八日或十四日。
analyzed: 持明者於黑月八日或十四日。

Smears his body with corpse ash.

original: 觀想一切眾生如彼虛空。
analyzed: 觀想一切眾生如彼虛空。

Will quickly die in a short time.

One should also, at the time of death, give rise to no doubts.
Next, the method of accomplishment.
Use the flesh and skin of a dyer to make human flesh.
Make an image of Pinenayakata.
One cubit in length.

original: 用辣油塗像以芥子油煎。
analyzed: 用辣油塗像以芥子油煎。
translated: Smear the image with pungent oil and fry it with mustard oil.
On the eighth or fourteenth day of the dark half of the month.

original: 持明者以吠嚕左曩藥塗於自身。
analyzed: 持明者以吠嚕左曩藥塗於自身。
translated: The vidyādhara smears his body with vṛṣalā herb.
Go inside the house made of skin.
Hold the image with the left hand.
Eat the image from the left cheek of the mouth.
Recite the name of the sādhya and think like this.
I now eat the blood and flesh of so-and-so.
Having thought this, then eat the image.

original: 所有設咄嚕須臾之間即得命終。
analyzed: 所有設咄嚕須臾之間即得命終。
translated: The sādhya will die in an instant.
Next, the method of accomplishment.

original: 如前人肉作頻那夜迦天像。
analyzed: 如前人肉作頻那夜迦天像。
translated: As before, make an image of Pinenayakata with human flesh.
One cubit long, with four arms, in the form of a dog.
The vidyādhara uses the little fingernail of the left hand.
Pierce the navel of the image.
Fill the navel of the image with the three pungent medicines.
On the eighth or fourteenth day of the dark half of the month,
go to a charnel ground.
Fry the heavenly image with red sesame oil.

original: 持誦大明及稱大惡設咄嚕名。
analyzed: 持誦大明及稱大惡設咄嚕名。
translated: Recite the great mantra and call the name of the great evil sedum.

original: 持明者漸漸食天像及飲酒。
analyzed: 持明者漸漸食天像及飲酒。
translated: The vidyādhara gradually eats the heavenly image and drinks wine.

original: 所有輕慢三寶謗阿闍梨。
analyzed: 所有輕慢三寶謗阿闍梨。
translated: Those who slight the Three Jewels, slander the ācārya,
Cut off good roots, and destroy the Buddha's teachings,
Will quickly cause them to die in an instant.
This has no method of release.

original: 用邊方人肉作頻那夜迦天像。
analyzed: 用邊方人肉作頻那夜迦天像。

Eight inches long.
Smear the image with salt and mustard seeds.
Fry it in pungent oil.
The vidyādhara goes to a crossroads.
Naked, with disheveled hair.
Smear the body with pungent oil and think like this:

analyzed: 我今食彼某甲設咄嚕血肉。

Having thought like this,
then eat the heavenly image and drink the blood.
Within one night, that Sādhya will🔽
Within one night, the body of that Skt. sādhu will be completely drained of blood and flesh, leaving only bones and chains.
At the time of sunrise, he will immediately lose his life.

original: 彼設咄嚕在一由旬外當作此法。
analyzed: 彼設咄嚕在一由旬外當作此法。
translated: That Skt. sādhu should perform this method from a distance of one yojana.
Next, the method of accomplishment.

original: 用前肉作七箇頻那夜迦天像。
analyzed: 用前肉作七箇頻那夜迦天像。
translated: Use the previous meat to make seven images of Pṛthivī, the god of wealth,
shaped like oil cakes.
The first image is smeared with molasses and mustard seeds.

original: 第二像用水牛生酥塗。🔽第三像用羖羊生酥塗。
analyzed: 第二像用水牛生酥塗。 第三像用羖羊生酥塗。
translated: The second image is smeared with the raw ghee of a buffalo.🔽The third image is smeared with the raw ghee of a ewe.
The fourth image is smeared with the raw ghee of a yellow ox.

original: 第五像用欝金自然汁塗。
analyzed: 第五像用欝金自然汁塗。
translated: The fifth image is smeared with the natural juice of saffron.
The sixth image is smeared with the dregs of ghee and sugar.

original: 第七像用阿羅訖怛迦藥自然汁塗。
analyzed: 第七像用阿羅訖怛迦藥自然汁塗。
translated: The seventh image is smeared with the natural juice of the medicine aragwadha.
Next, the first image is fried in hot oil.
The second image is fried in sesame oil.
The third image is fried in the raw ghee of a yellow ox.
The fourth image is fried in mature ghee.
The fifth image is fried in goat's milk butter.
The sixth image is fried in red sesame oil.

original: 第七像前酥油內隨取一般煎彼天像。
analyzed: 第七像前酥油內隨取一般煎彼天像。
translated: The seventh image is fried in either butter or oil, whichever is available.

original: 持明者往四衢道中而自作念。
analyzed: 持明者往四衢道中而自作念。
translated: The vidyādhara goes to a crossroads and thinks to himself:
I will now eat so-and-so's seṭṭi.
Having had this thought, he then eats the first image.

original: 彼設咄嚕經一時中命終。
analyzed: 彼設咄嚕經一時中命終。
translated: That seṭṭi will die within a moment.
The vidyādhara, naked and riding an elephant,

original: 以二足展舒手持第二像。
analyzed: 以二足展舒手持第二像。
translated: with his two feet stretched out and holding the second image in his hand,
looks in the direction of the seṭṭi.
He thinks like this:

original: 我今令彼設咄嚕怖畏馳走。
analyzed: 我今令彼設咄嚕怖畏馳走。
translated: I will now cause that seṭṭi to be frightened and run away.
Having had this thought, he eats the second image.

original: 經七日內彼設咄嚕怖畏馳走。
analyzed: 經七日內彼設咄嚕怖畏馳走。
translated: Within seven days, that seṭṭi will be frightened and run away.

original: 持明者於月四日或五日八日。
analyzed: 持明者於月四日或五日八日。
translated: The vidyādhara, on the fourth or fifth day of the month or the eighth day,
stands on one foot and thinks:
I will now eat so-and-so's seṭṭi.
Having thought this, he then uses his two feet to stand on the ground.
Eat the third image.

original: 至三日內能破壞設咄嚕。
analyzed: 至三日內能破壞設咄嚕。
translated: Within three days, he can destroy the siddhi.
The vidyādhara then thinks like this:

analyzed: 我今當食某甲設咄嚕令得大病。
translated: I will now eat so-and-so's siddhi and cause him to become greatly ill.
Having thought like this, he goes to that person's house.
Naked, with disheveled hair, he eats the fourth image.
On that very day, he will obtain a great illness.
The vidyādhara goes to the crossroads.
Standing with his feet together, he thinks like this:
I will bind so-and-so's siddhi.
Having thought like this,
in an instant, he will obtain the binding.

original: 持明者用不到地瞿摩夷。
analyzed: 持明者用不到地瞿摩夷。
translated: The vidyādhara uses unattainable cow bezoar.
In front of a prostitute's door, he makes a maṇḍala.
The vidyādhara makes the maṇḍala step.
He thinks like this:

original: 我今當與某甲人作於息災。
analyzed: 我今當與某甲人作於息災。
translated: I will now perform pacification for so-and-so.
Having thought like this, he then eats the sixth image.
On that very day, he will obtain pacification.

original: 持明者用吠嚕左曩藥及五種三昧藥。
analyzed: 持明者用吠嚕左曩藥及五種三昧藥。
translated: The practitioner should use the medicine of Varuṇa and the five kinds of samādhi medicine.
Make a maṇḍala.
Use incense, flowers, and so forth.
Make offerings to the maṇḍala sages and saints.

original: 持明者發寂靜心作念云。
analyzed: 持明者發寂靜心作念云。
translated: The practitioner should give rise to a peaceful mind and think:

original: 復次頻那夜迦天持明者。
analyzed: 復次頻那夜迦天持明者。

can restrain the armies of others.

analyzed: 然後以右手無名指與拇指。
translated: Then, with the ring finger and thumb of the right hand,
place them on the tip of one's tongue.

translated: Further visualize those soldiers, horses, and so forth entering your own abdomen.
After visualizing this,
those soldiers, horses, and so forth will all be completely stopped.
Not a single one will dare to be brave.

The vidyādhara who wishes to destroy the armies of others

He spits the contents on his tongue towards the enemy army.
No more than twenty-five spits.
Those soldiers, horses, and so forth,

Use the flesh of elephants, horses, cows, donkeys, and humans, etc.

analyzed: 持明者食此肉已及飲酒。
translated: The vidyādhara eats this flesh and drinks wine.
Again, use the previous meat to smear on one's own body.

original: 往彼陣前面向他軍作舞。
analyzed: 往彼陣前面向他軍作舞。
translated: Go to the front of the enemy's army, face the other troops, and dance.

original: 彼軍見已悉皆禁止不能征戰。
analyzed: 彼軍見已悉皆禁止不能征戰。
translated: When the enemy troops see this, they will all be restrained and unable to fight.
One's own troops will gain victory and return.
After returning, the vidyādhara again dances.
With both hands, constantly clap in front of the enemy troops.
They will fight among themselves and run far away.

Again, use a pure practitioner's rosary.
Draw an image of a deity with two arms and three eyes.
Hang the image together with the previous deity image on a pole.
Stand it in front of the enemy troops.

original: 彼軍見者悉皆驚怖四散馳走。
analyzed: 彼軍見者悉皆驚怖四散馳走。
translated: Those in the enemy troops who see it will all be frightened and flee in all directions.

original: 經六箇月不能歸還本國。
analyzed: 經六箇月不能歸還本國。
translated: After six months, he was unable to return to his home country.

original: 持明者見二軍列陣將欲交戰。
analyzed: 持明者見二軍列陣將欲交戰。
translated: The vidyādhara sees two armies arrayed in battle formation about to engage in combat.
As before, perform the method.

analyzed: 畫二㡧像用頭髮為繩以二㡧相背縛之掛一竿上。

analyzed: 於兩陣中間掘坑深一人量。

If the armies see this banner,
they will all flee to a place one arrow's distance away.

original: 或持明者執㡧竿右旋轉之。
analyzed: 或持明者執㡧竿右旋轉之。
translated: Or the vidyādhara holds the banner pole and turns it to the right.
Then the two armies will naturally fight.
If the banner pole stops, the two armies will also stop.

original: 用前藥法畫頻那夜迦天像。
analyzed: 用前藥法畫頻那夜迦天像。
translated: Use the previous medicine method to draw an image of Piņāyaka.
One head and four bodies, each with four arms.
The four hands hold the heads of seṭṭha.

original: 餘手執種種器仗作破壞相。
analyzed: 餘手執種種器仗作破壞相。
translated: The remaining hands hold various weapons, making a destructive appearance.
The vidyādhara, on the fourteenth day of the dark half of the month,

analyzed: 如前用甘露藥及三昧藥等。
translated: Use the nectar medicine and samādhi medicine as before.
Smear it on one's own body.
Wrap this image with a cloth.
The vidyādhara holds the image in their hand.

original: 隨意經行得隱身法乃至諸天亦不能見。
analyzed: 隨意經行得隱身法乃至諸天亦不能見。
translated: They can walk as they wish and attain the method of invisibility, even the gods cannot see them,
let alone ordinary people.

original: 持明者於此法中勿生疑惑。
analyzed: 持明者於此法中勿生疑惑。
translated: The vidyādhara should not give rise to doubt in this method.

original: 若生疑者是人破金剛薩埵勅。
analyzed: 若生疑者是人破金剛薩埵勅。
translated: If one gives rise to doubt, this person breaks the order of Vajrasattva.

original: 此成就法是頻那夜迦親說有大威力。
analyzed: 此成就法是頻那夜迦親說有大威力。
translated: This accomplishment method was personally spoken by Piṇḍīyavāhana and has great power.

The vidyādhara uses cat meat and chicken meat.
Together make an image of Piṇḍīyavāhana.
Fry it according to the previous method.
Eat that heavenly image.

original: 於竟夜中思惟所作善惡之事。
analyzed: 於竟夜中思惟所作善惡之事。
translated: During the entire night, contemplate the good and evil deeds to be done.

original: 復觀想自身作甘露軍拏利。
analyzed: 復觀想自身作甘露軍拏利。
translated: Again, visualize oneself as Amṛtakuṇḍali.

original: 頻那夜迦天依金剛薩埵勅。
analyzed: 頻那夜迦天依金剛薩埵勅。
translated: Piṇḍīyavāhana, relying on the order of Vajrasattva,
Can do all things.
Next, the accomplishment method.

original: 持明者於㡧像前用屍灰辣油。
analyzed: 持明者於㡧像前用屍灰辣油。
translated: The practitioner, in front of the pata, uses corpse ash and pungent oil
to smear both breasts of the practitioner's own body.
Using a corpse fire,
one can cause the person whose name is uttered to obtain a fever.
Next, the method of accomplishment.

original: 持明者用吠嚕左曩藥塗於自身已。
analyzed: 持明者用吠嚕左曩藥塗於自身已。
translated: The practitioner uses the medicine of Vṛṣa to smear their own body.
Take the previous pata, wrap it in silk,
and utter the name of the king.
Mentally recite the mantra to summon him.
Again, use a corpse fire to heat it twenty-two times.
In an instant, one can obtain the king and others.
They will quickly come to provide service according to the practitioner's wishes.
Next, the method of accomplishment.

original: 依法如前用牛血畫頻那夜迦天像。
analyzed: 依法如前用牛血畫頻那夜迦天像。
translated: In accordance with the Dharma, as before, use cow blood to paint the image of Piṇḍīyavara.

original: 持明者用甘露藥及三昧藥。
analyzed: 持明者用甘露藥及三昧藥。
translated: The practitioner uses the medicine of nectar and samādhi medicine
to smear their own hands.
Hold the pata and eat beef.
Next, use the hand to rotate the meat until dawn.
All those who see it will be respectfully loved.
Next, the method of accomplishment.

original: 用牛肉及五種甘露藥三昧藥。
analyzed: 用牛肉及五種甘露藥三昧藥。
translated: Use beef and the five kinds of nectar medicines and samādhi medicines.
Mix them together to make a maṇḍala.

original: 用前㡧像鋪展曼拏羅內。
analyzed: 用前㡧像鋪展曼拏羅內。
translated: Use the previously prepared painting to spread out inside the maṇḍala.
The vidyādhara sits on top of the painting.
Eat the meat of a fox and a crow.

original: 稱童女名顧視十方心作觀想。
analyzed: 稱童女名顧視十方心作觀想。
translated: Recite the name of the young girl and look in the ten directions, contemplating in the mind.
From night to dawn, the method will be accomplished.

original: 彼之童女不欲事於他人。
analyzed: 彼之童女不欲事於他人。
translated: That young girl will not want to serve others.
She will love and respect the vidyādhara.
Next, the vidyādhara uses human blood.

original: 於屍衣上畫頻那夜迦天像。
analyzed: 於屍衣上畫頻那夜迦天像。
translated: On a corpse cloth, draw a painting of Piṇḍīpātra.
Eight arms, four faces, four feet.
Each face has two eyes and is covered with hair.
On one side of the deity painting,
Draw the form of a king.
The first right hand holds a vajra scepter.
